1.Name: Will Lillis
1.Statement: I believe my previous experience serving in the SPS will aid me in any of the three leadership positions in the club. Furthermore, I also have served as treasurer for the YAF club, familiarizing myself with the p card process among other treasurer duties.

2.Name: Andrew Rippy
2.Statement: I feel with the relationship that me (or any of the seniors) have with the physics department, as well as our previous involvement with the club before COVID killed everything, would be a good basis to kick start the club once again, and get it ready to be passed on to the next generation of physics students.
